dc_title_s: Map of Upper Maumee and Lower Auglaize River Basins showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Upper Maumee and Lower Auglaize Basins, quality of underground water, and summary.|"Prepared by ALFRED C. WALKER, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water, from data compiled by Lawrence R. Brunstetter".|Scale bar lower right corner.
